thread.title: Nancy Littleton
thread.title_full: Antique Lamp Supply reviewed by Nancy Littleton

author: Nancy Littleton
title: Nancy Littleton
text: have a set of small lamps with glass shades (one shade was broken). these lamps belonged to my in-laws & we have had them for many, many years. decided to try find a replacement shade instead of shopping around and was very surprised to find the exact match at Antique Lamp Supply. it has been wonderful to place these lamps in full view instead of hidden on a shelf. thanks very much.
